character.noteList: Dwarf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Advantage on saves vs poison, poison damage resistance • Double proficiency bonus to History checks concerning stonework (even if not proficient) • Battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, warhammer proficiency • Gain 1 extra hit point per level Criminal Feature: • You know someone who can connect you with other criminals Rogue Features: • Double proficiency with chosen skills • Sneak Attack (2d6) • Understand a secret language • Double proficiency with chosen skills (Deception,Persuasion) Wizard Features: • Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day) • You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action • Rogue Archetype: Mastermind • You gain fluency with two languages and proficiency with a gaming set, disguise kit, and forger's set • Can make yourself sound like a local • Use help action on targets within 30ft as a bonus action • Magic Initiate: You gain two cantrips and a first level spell which you can cast 1/day from a single spellcasting class • Wizard Archetype: Illusion • Half gold/time cost to copy school spells • You can cast minor illusion, and can have both visual and auditory effects ⊠Light Armor ⊠Battleaxe Handaxe Throwing Hammer Warhammer Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠Smith's Tools OR Brewer's Supplies OR Mason's Tools One type of gaming set Thieves' Tools Thieves' Tools Disguise kit Forgery kit One gaming set ⊠Common Dwarvish Thieves' Cant Two Extra Languages ⊠rapier shortbow dagger (2) arrows (20) burglar's pack thieves' tools crowbar set of dark common clothes hood belt pouch ⊠⊠Rogue 4, Wizard 2⊠Hill Dwarf⊠Criminal⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Hanseld⊠Rogue 4, Wizard 2⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠15⊠0⊠0
